combined_dialog: It's not getting away from me this time.
''This'' is how you catch a fish.
Why is it that every time ''you'' play with magic water, ''I'' get soaked?
Yeah, yeah, "an ancient art unique to our culture", blah, blah, blah.
Look, I'm just saying that if I had weird powers, I'd keep my weirdness to myself.
Well, maybe you should've ''waterbended'' us out of the ice.
Okay, you've gone from "weird" to "freakish", Katara.
We don't know what that ''thing'' is!
How did you get in the ice?
Right, and this is Katara, my flying sister.
Did you see that crazy bolt of light?!
He was probably trying to signal the Fire Navy!
You just sneezed ... and flew ten feet in the air!
Giant light beams, flying bison, airbenders ...
I think I got midnight sun madness.
I'm going home to where stuff makes sense.
I'm not getting on that fluffy ''snot'' monster!
Wow, that was ''truly'' amazing ... What is this, a weapon?
Ya know, last time I checked, humans ''can't fly!''
You're an airbender, Katara's a waterbender.
Together you can just waste time ''all'' day long.
Now men, it's important that you show no fear when you face a firebender.
In the Water Tribe, we fight to the last man standing!
For without courage, how can we call ourselves men?
Until your fathers return from the War, they're counting on ''you'' to be the men of this tribe, and that means ''no potty breaks''!
Okay, who else has to go?
Katara, get him out of here!
We don't have time for fun and games with ''the War'' going on!
You signaled the Fire Navy with that flare!
You're leading them straight to us, aren't you?
The foreigner is banished from our village.
No, I'm keeping my promise to Dad.
I'm protecting you, from threats like him!
We can't fight firebenders with fun!
Would you really choose him over your tribe?
Let's see your bison fly now, ''air boy.''
The Fire Nation could be on our shores any moment now!
Are you gonna talk all day, or are you comin' with me?
Get in, we're going to save your boyfriend.
You just looove taking me out of my comfort zone, don't you?
What was it that kid said?
Katara, he's - I mean, big deal.
Well, I couldn't let you have ''all'' the glory.
I'm just a guy, with a boomerang.
I didn't ask for all this flying and ''magic!''
I'm'' trying'' to find us some food.
Who ate all of my blubbered seal jerky?!
No wonder the flames smelled so good.
So where do I get something to eat?
I'm just a simple guy, with simple needs.
Making him feel better is putting ''me'' in a world of hurt.
You know, you can't protect him forever.
And whoever's in there might have a medley of delicious cured meats!
I don't suppose you have a key?
Katara, you really believe in that stuff?
No wonder I didn't trust you when we first met.
You just couldn't get any weirder.
That firebender won't know what hit him.
Not if I get him first!
Aang, I wasn't ''really'' going to eat the lemur, okay?
He found out firebenders killed Gyatso!
Before he blows us off the mountain!
Katara and I aren't going to let anything happen to you.
You have no idea where you're going, do you?
I guess we're getting close then.
You need to give girls space when they do their sewing.
Girls are better at fixing pants than guys and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that.
It's just the natural order of things.
We just made a pit stop yesterday.
Shouldn't we get a little more flying done before we camp out?
Still, hard to argue with a ten-ton magical monster.
The fish is doing all the work.
Well, let's not stick around to find out.
Or, we could stay a while.
Where are the men who ambushed us?
Wait a second, there's no way that a bunch of girls took us down.
I'll show them a thing or two.
I'm not scared of any girls.
Who do they think they are anyway?
I can't believe I got beat up by a bunch of girls.
Sorry ladies, didn't mean to interrupt your dance lesson.
I was just looking for somewhere to get a little workout?
I mean, normally I'd hold a grudge, but seeing as you guys are a bunch of girls, I'll make an exception.
After all, I'm the best warrior in my village.
I ... Well, if that's what you want, I'd be happy to.
All right, you stand over there.
Now, this may be a little tough, but try to block me.
Of course, I was going easy on you.
Let's see if you can handle ''this''!
I would be honored if you would teach me.
I'm sorry if I insulted you earlier.
Do I really have to wear this?
I think I'm starting to get it.
Hey, I'm not a ... oh, whatever!
I treated you like a girl when I should've treated you like a warrior.
Now you look just like my grandfather.
If you think we're going to fit through there, you're crazier than that king.
Eh, how was Appa supposed to save us anyway?
You know, because of all the rocks.
Why did you do all of this instead of just telling Aang who you were?
Shouldn't we run ''away'' from huge booms?
He looks dangerous, so we better approach cautiously.
I worked hard to get those nuts!
How long has the Fire Nation been here?
Everyone should get some sleep, we're leaving at dawn.
This village is crawling with Fire Nation troops.
If they discover you're here, Aang, we'll be eating fireballs for breakfast.
Then it's too late to track him, he's long gone.
I thought you were crazy at first, Katara, but this might work.
There are ventilation shafts throughout these mines.
All Aang has to do is send an air current from that vent to this one right here.
By ''this,'' do you mean intentionally being captured by a group of ruthless firebenders?
Get out of my way, pipsqueak!
No, you idiot, it's the girl!
You've got twelve hours to find Haru.
What do you mean you're not leaving?
I hate when you get like this.
Wouldn't he just take his keys with him?
For that they'd need some kind of earth, or some rock.
These vents reminded me of our little trick back at the village.
We're gonna do the same thing, but on a much bigger scale.
There's a huge deposit of coal at the base of the silo.
And the whole system is ventilated.
Aang closed off all the vents except one.
When he does his airbending the coal only has one place to go, right back here.
I'm not allowed to be angry?
We're all going to get eaten by a spirit monster.
We can't sit here and cower while Aang waits for some monster to show up.
He still shouldn't have to face this alone.
It doesn't seem too interested in what he's saying.
Maybe we should go help him.
Like I seriously need to use the bathroom.
You could give us some supplies, and some money.
At least, not without your friends.
Can't you make Appa go any faster?
We got into the Fire Nation.
Refreshed and ready to fight some firebenders!
Do you know where you're going?
You're only a hundred years late!
I think I can help you out.
This is a little trick I picked up from my father.
I seal the lamp oil inside an animal skin casing, Shyu lights the oil soaked twine and, ta-da!
That firebending looked as strong as any firebending I've seen.
How are ''we'' gonna make it out of this?
If we hit a bump, you'll go flying off.
You pretty much mastered airbending and that only took you a hundred and twelve years.
I'm sure you can master three more elements by next summer.
So what am I supposed to do?
So, while you guys are playing in the water, I'm supposed to be hard at work picking mud out of a giant bison's feet?
You just "practiced" our supplies down the river.
My life was hard enough when you were just an airbender.
We've got exactly three copper pieces left from the money that King Bumi gave us.
Even Momo thinks it's a piece of junk.
Wait a minute ... Sea loving traders, with suspiciously acquired merchandise, and pet reptile birds?
Yeah, I was just starting to browse through their boomerang collection.
No wonder they were trying to hack us up!
You put all of our lives in danger just so you could learn some stupid, fancy splashes.
It's just a matter of time before she gets us all in deep- Oh, what?
I'm not good enough to kidnap?
You're really gonna hand over ''the Avatar'' for a stupid piece of parchment?
Sure is, and I'll bet he'll fetch a lot more on the black market than that fancy scroll.
I'm just sayin' it's bad business sense.
Think how much the Fire Lord would pay for the Avatar.
You guys would be set for life.
We'd need a team of rhinos to budge this ship.
This thing wasn't made by the Water Tribe!
Would you two quit congratulating each other and help me out?
This is no time for flute practice!
Is that really how you feel?
Right, got it ... Ordinarily, you'd be right, but seeing how it's the dry season, you're not.
Besides that tarp makes a pretty warm blanket.
Then I would have put up the tarp for nothing.
Katara, why don't you worry about gathering firewood, because that kindling is looking pretty sorry.
Fine by me, if you're not gonna do your job- Why don't you ask Miss Know-It-All, Queen of the Twigs.
Then I'm sure we'll be able to see it very clearly from the air while we fly away.
Calm down, we know you're next.
Aang, this feuding tribe stuff is serious business.
Are you sure it's a good idea getting involved in this?
His job's gonna make us cross this whole canyon on foot isn't it?
I thought the whole point of ditching our food was so we wouldn't have to deal with things like canyon crawlers.
So, you guys aren't going to put up your tarps?
Yeah Katara, what are you talking about?
Wei Jin didn't steal the orb, he was returning it to their village gate and was wrongfully punished by the Gan Jin.
I only took their side 'cause they fed me.
That's some luck you knew Jin Wei and Wei Jin.
Don't have to tell me twice.
We shouldn't go to the market.
Out of food and out of money.
Now what are we supposed to do?
You said get a job ... and he's ''paying double''.
I said I was going to do this job.
I can't back out just because of some bad weather.
Seriously, you're still going to pay me, right?
You know what I love about Appa the most?
Water ... Who's this "Aang" kid you keep talking about, Your Highness?
You are so going to be dinner!
Maybe instead of saving the world, you can go into the jewelry-making business.
No, punch him in the bill!
Lucky for you, we came along.
Of course she predicted it was going to rain.
The sky's been gray all day!
Look, I'm going to predict the future now.
I can't believe we're here in the house of nonsense.
It would be nice to have some bean curd puffs.
Love, who she's going to marry, how many babies she's going to have.
Looks like someone had a pretty good bathroom break.
I don't even want to know!
Okay, let's get this over with.
But you didn't read my palms or anything!
Well, now you got to see for yourselves how fortune telling is just a big, stupid hoax.
My life will calm and happy and joyful!
I can't believe you would trust your lives to that crazy, old woman's superstition!
I can't believe all these saps!
Someone really needs to scream some sense into them.
I'm going to prove Aunt Wu's predictions are nonsense.
Hey you, I bet Aunt Wu told you to wear those red shoes, didn't she?
Uh huh ... And how many times have you worn those shoes since you got that fortune?
I don't care what Aunt Wu told you!
You have to take a bath sometime!
You've come to the right place.
What can I do you for?
I think I know who you mean.
And to tell you the truth, I've been picking up a subtle vibe that she likes you, too.
Oh yeah, she's crazy about you.
All you have to do now is not mess it up.
The number once mistake nice guys like you make: being too nice.
If you want to keep her interested, you have to act aloof, like you don't really care one way or the other.
I can't believe you're dragging me all the way up here for a stupid flower.
Flowers are fine once you're married, but at this early stage, it's critical that you maintain maximum aloofness.
Don't tell me you believe in that stuff, too.
Those people all think they're safe!
Well, we have other things to worry about.
Aunt Wu was wrong about the volcano.
Everyone, that volcano is gonna blow any second!
Can your fortune telling explain that?
Something is happening in the clouds.
Lava is gonna flow downhill to this spot.
If we can dig a deep enough trench we can channel all the lava away from the village to the river.
Everybody else grab a shovel Come on!
Man, sometimes I forget what a powerful bender that kid is.
Nothing, just that Aang is one powerful bender.
No offense, but I hope this taught everyone a lesson about not relying too much on fortune telling.
This is a Water Tribe weapon.
See if you can find anything else.
Water Tribe warriors ambushed a group of firebenders.
The firebenders fought back, but the warriors drove them down this hill.
No, but it's from his fleet.
I'm strong, I'm brave, I can fight!
Maybe we can dump some on Appa, because he stinks so much.
Dad could eat a whole barrel of these things!
So, who was it that came up with the Great Blubber Fiasco?
It's a long one Aang, some other time.
Was it you or Dad that put an octopus on your head and convinced Gran-Gran you were a water spirit?
It's been over two years since we've seen Dad.
It would be great, but we can't.
We have to take Aang to the North Pole first.
Is this the boat he took you ice dodging in?
How are we supposed to ice dodge without ice?
Aang, ease up on the jib.
Aang, I'm gonna need air in that sail.
Katara, I want you to bend as much water as you can between us and those rocks.
This is the map to our father!
You had it the whole time?
Well, you can go to the North Pole on your own.
I wanna see Dad, but, helping Aang is where we're needed the most.
I'm ... starting to get some feeling back!
That thing sees with its nose.
Let's give him something to look at.
Yeah, we've lost too much time as it is.
And right now, you need us more.
I wonder why they left this boat?
I don't want to talk about it.
See if you can find a menu, I'm starving!
It's like you're a whole different person ... Where are we gonna get masks like that?
Knowing the Fire Nation, it's probably an execution.
What do you think you're doing?
No, we don't want to make a scene!
I think it's time to go.
I hope he can really hear that bison whistle!
You really know your explosives ... You're a Fire Nation Soldier!
He was very highly ranked, we get it.
We're ''not'' gonna go find some ''crazy'' firebender!
Look, thanks for the help, but we're leaving for the North Pole in the morning.
That's what you said about going to the festival!
Why doesn't anyone ever listen to me?
Hold on, you know these guys?
I told you we shouldn't mess around with this!
Oh ... Well then thanks for all the first aid over the years.
Like when I fell into the greaseberry bramble.
Or that time I had two fishhooks in my thumb!
Oh, and the time that mink snake bit me!
Sorry ... You want me to be like you, or totally honest?
We better find some solid ground, before it finds us.
Wait, how can you tell the time from that thing?
The notches all look the same.
You put spark powder in the candle!
Why would you want to use fireflies for light?
Okay ... so you brought me all the way down here to see an empty room.
So, this place is an explosion waiting to happen.
How can something so small that you can't even see it make such a big stink!?
Yeah ... if we put a whole mess of rotten eggs in the cellar where the gas seeps up ... Then, if there's a leak ... And plug up the hole where the gas is escaping!
You make weapons for the Fire Nation?!
See, the problem with the old war balloon was you could get it air-borne, but once it did, it just kept going.
You could put a hole in the top, but then all the hot air would escape.
So the question became, how do you keep a lid on hot air?
A lid is actually the answer.
If you control the hot air, you control the war balloon.
Okay, we've got four kinds of bombs: smoke, slime, fire, and ... Hey, why aren't they shooting at us?
Then I guess they won't see this coming.
Oh no, that was the last one.
That's were the gas is escaping.
It's the only bomb we've got.
Aang you were right about air power.
As long as we've got the skies, we'll have the Fire Nation on the run.
So ... uhhh ... you're a princess, huh?
You know, back in my tribe, I'm kind of like a prince, myself.
I'm trying to have a conversation here.
So, it looks like I'm going to be in town for a while.
I'm thinking ... maybe we could ... do an activity, together?
How about that picnic last night?
Boy, your dad sure does know how to throw a party.
Well, it wasn't as much fun after you left.
So, I'm still hoping we can see more of each other.
Yes ... at a place ... for some time.
That's okay, it was worth it.
Actually, it's supposed to be a fish.
I don't get it, one minute she wants to go out with me, and the next, she's telling me to get lost.
Why don't you just teach her, Aang?
You're not going to win this fight!
I just want you to know, I think you're beautiful, and, I never thought a girl like you would even notice a guy like me.
I think I do understand now.
You don't have to say anything.
I grew up in a block of ice.
It's not exactly a cultural hub.
You need to meet my good friend, Appa.
Appa and I go way back, don't we, boy?
Yeah, we pretty much live up here.
I've seen this before, right before my village was attacked.
They've closed in on the North Pole and from the looks of this stuff, I'd say there's a lot of them.
You don't love him, do you?
You don't even seem to like him.
Fire Navy uniforms don't look like that.
When, like, a hundred years ago?
The Fire Nation doesn't wear shoulder spikes anymore.
The newer uniforms are more streamlined.
Princess Yue is wasted on a self-absorbed weasel like you!
Hahn's out there on the top-secret mission while I'm here sharpening my boomerang.
What, you want me to scrub the barracks?
Where did they go ... You did everything you could, and now we need to do everything we can to get him back.
They're not going to die in this blizzard.
If we know anything, it's that Zuko never gives up.
They'll survive, and we'll find them.
Hey, this is some quality rope!
Yeah, this makes a lot of sense.
Let's bring the guy who's constantly trying to kill us.
You don't have to do that.
Your father told me to protect you.
But sir, the thing is, Aang can only do those things when he's in the Avatar State.
Remember when he took out the Fire Navy?
Or just glow it up and stop that Fire Lord!
I guess he could talk the Fire Lord to death.
Maybe I can shock you into the Avatar State.
He's trying to force Aang into the Avatar State!
Anybody got a problem with that?
You guys are going to be done soon, right?
We have a lot of ground to cover if we're going to make it to Omashu today.
I could be ready in two minutes.
Look, I hate to be the wet blanket here, but since Katara is busy, I guess it's up to me.
We need to get to Omashu.
No sidetracks, no worms and definitely no rainbows.
I think we'll just stick with flying.
We've dealt with the Fire Nation before.
How far are we from the tunnel?
There's no way we're going through some cursed hole!
All we need is a plan.
Chong, how long do those torches last?
It doesn't work like that if they're all lit at the same time!
I'm going to make a map to keep track of exactly where we've been.
Then we should be able to solve it like a maze and get through.
We already came through this way.
Right, if only we listened to you.
At least I'm ''thinking'' of ideas and trying to get us out of here, Moku.
No, they were trying to get away from something!
Come on guys, help me out!
How did you guys get out?
We let huge, ferocious beasts lead our way.
The journey was long and annoying, but now you get to see what it's really about: the destination.
I present to you the Earth Kingdom city of O- Oh no ... Up until now it was.
Now Ba Sing Se is the only great Earth Kingdom stronghold left.
We don't even know if Bumi's still ... A-around.
Why didn't we just use this last time?
Where would they be keeping him?
You're all about to come down with a nasty case of pentapox.
The marks make ya look sick, but you gotta act sick too.
Now that's what I'm talkin' about.
You realize we're probably walking right into a trap.
Hey, you taking us down for a reason?
Aang, why are we going down?
Is it telling you where we can get something to eat?
No offense to the swamp, but I don't see any land there to land on.
See, even Appa and Momo don't like it here.
You better throw in an extra "yip"!
Why do things keep attaching to me?!
Do you want me to say "please" and "thank you" as I swing my machete back and forth?
I'm sure there are lots of things that are alive here and if we don't wanna wind up getting eaten by them, we need to find Appa as fast as we can.
There's no way they can hear us and no way we can see them.
We'll have to make camp for the night.
Look, there's nothing supernatural going on here.
I think we should build a fire.
Please, we're all alone out here.
You think you're so tough, huh?
This is just a trick of the light ... swamp gas ...
I ... hit my head running away last night.
What do you guys think you're doing!?
I've been looking all over for you!
Well, there must be a tea party here and we just didn't get our invitations!
Look, we were all just scared and hungry and our minds were playing tricks on us.
That's why we all saw things out here.
Look, I think about her all the time, and you saw Mom, someone you miss a lot.
For the last time, there's nothing after us and there's nothing magical happening here.
Stuff like that happens to us a lot.
Not a monster, just a regular guy defending his home.
Sorry to interrupt the lesson, but we still need to find Appa and Momo.
So why were you guys so interested in eating Appa?
You've got plenty of those big things wandering around.
Well, I hope you realize now that nothing strange was going on here.
Just a bunch of greasy people living in a swamp.
I told you, we were hungry.
That's Avatar stuff, that doesn't count.
The only thing I can't figure out is how you made that tornado that sucked us down.
Still, there's absolutely nothing mysterious about the swamp.
What are you doing in my mouth?
Momo, you need to be a little more sensitive to my boundaries.
Oh, I see, so there's time to get your scrolls and time to get your staff, but no time for my boomerang?
I feel like I've lost part of my identity.
Imagine if you lost your arrow, or Katara lost her ... hair loopies.
I used to be boomerang guy ... And here comes Avatar Roku!
And it's nice to appreciate their deep-fried festival food!
Now a torch, that's a nice prop.
But I'm not sure I could carry it off.
So some people don't like you, big deal!
There's a whole nation of firebenders who hate you.
Now let's bust you out of here!
How're we gonna to do that?
The crime happened over three hundred years ago.
Well, I guess I could be classified as such.
Everyone wanted to blame it on the polar leopard, but I figured out it was Old Man Jarko wearing polar leopard boots!
See, a real eight hundred-pound polar leopard would have left much deeper tracks.
Okay, I guess I am pretty good.
But I'm going to need some new props.
This temple and this statue were cut from the same stone.
And we know that the statue was built after Chin died.
That means Kyoshi never set foot in this temple!
We need to go to Kyoshi Island.
So, uh ... what's Suki up to?
These things mean anything to you?
There's no way Kyoshi could have made that footprint.
And therefore there is nothing linking her to the crime scene.
Wait, are you sure it was today?
This ceremony didn't take place at sunrise.
If Kyoshi was in the ceremony at sunset, she couldn't have been in Chin committing the crime.
I do believe in the power of stuff.
This is by far the worst town we've ever been to.
It's pricey ... but I really do like it.
Oh, I got to remember that one!
I don't need a new bag!
Why did you let me buy this?
Go back to the Fire Nation!
The Boulder knows how to put the hurt in the dirt!
I've got to admit, now I'm really glad I bought this bag.
Don't answer to Twinkle Toes, it's not manly!
Look, we all have to do our part to win this war, and yours is to teach Aang earthbending.
Whoever took Aang and Toph left this.
Well, we'd better get out of here, before your dad changes his mind again.
Your powers of perception are frightening.
Hey, I'm just enjoying the show.
Okay, forget about setting up camp.
I'm finding the softest pile of dirt and going to sleep.
Oh, just some angry freak with a ponytail who's tracked us all over the world.
This is a warrior's wolf tail.
Anyway, whoever's chasing us couldn't have followed us here, so, now would everyone just shhh?
Always the optimist ... Actually Toph, there's four of us.
Oh no, the sun is rising.
We've been up all night with no sleep!
Okay, we've put in a lot of distance between us and them.
The plan right now is to follow Appa's lead and get some sleep.
Yeah, you two were pretty much jerks.
Okay, but what are we going to do about the tank full of dangerous ladies chasing us?
Toph couldn't have made it too far.
Appa, come on, we need to go faster!
Thanks Appa, I don't know what we'd do without you.
You're awfully cute, but unfortunately you're made of meat.
You are one lucky little meat creature.
You probably think I deserve this, don't you?
Look, I'm sorry I hunted you, but that's just the natural order of things.
Big things eat smaller things, nothing personal.
But this time it didn't work out that way.
Okay, you convinced me, if I get out of this alive, it's a karmically correct, vegetarian existence for me.
Even though meat is so tasty.
Hey, looks like my karma is already paying off!
Okay, karma person or thing, whoever's in charge of this stuff.
If I can just get out of this situation alive, I will give up meat and sarcasm.
It's pretty much my whole identity.
Sokka, the meat and sarcasm guy.
But I'm willing to be Sokka, the veggies and straight talk fellow.
You're going to pull my fingers off and I don't think the rest of me is coming!
Seriously Aang, I know you're new at it, but I could use a little earthbending here.
Well, if you can't earthbend me out of here, go get Toph.
Well, I wouldn't want you to feel uncomfortable ...
Awkward position, I think I know the feeling.
Aang, this is my friend, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops.
He looks nothing like a saber-tooth moose-lion.
Aang, this is bad, you've got to get me out of here!
Please Aang, you have to earthbend me out, there's no other way!
Awww, this is a really wonderful, touching moment.
So could you get me out of here so I can give you both a big, snuggly hug?
This is great and all, but don't we have more important things to worry about?
Even if you do master all of the elements, then what?
It's not like we have a map of the Fire Nation.
Should we just head west until we reach the Fire Lord's house?
We need some intelligence if we're going to win this war.
I don't see anything wrong with having one of those fruity beverages while we plan our strategy.
So Professor, you're obviously a well-traveled guy.
Do you have a more current map?
Ours seems to be a little dated.
Doesn't anybody have a good map of that place?
Oh, so this spirit has attractive assistants, huh?
If this place has books from all over the world, do you think they've got info on the Fire Nation?
Aang, I do believe it's my turn.
I'd like to spend my vacation at the library!
You gotta work here a little longer before you qualify for vacation time.
Professor, would you like to see our sky bison?
What kind of animal is that?
No, this is the library- look!
That fox thingy went in through a window.
I say we climb up there and give it a look.
Are you the spirit who brought this library to the physical world?
I'm not lying, I'm here with the Avatar, and he's the bridge between our worlds.
Oh, great spirit, check this out.
"The darkest day in Fire Nation history."
It's got a date at the top, but it doesn't say anything else.
I want to know what happened to the Fire Nation on their darkest day.
The information on the Fire Nation should be right up here.
Just when I think I'm one step ahead of the Fire Nation, it turns out they beat us here a long time ago.
I need to know what happened on the darkest day.
Um, sure, I guess I'll follow you.
Uh, this is beautiful, but how is it helpful?
